resources.string: "I'm the old man from scene twenty-four and I'm here to test your knowledge about Monty Python. I'll ask you Twelv.. TEN questions and if you answer them right you may cross in safety! Shall we begin?"
"#1 Pretend you're called Loretta. Where would you keep your baby?"
"#2 What is the capital of Assyria?"
"#3 What would you say to defeat the Knights Who Say Ni?"
"#5 Which one is NOT one of the Spanish Inquisition's chief weapons:"
"an almost fanatical devotion to the Pope"
"#6 Type the name of this python:"
"#7 What CANNOT be found in the Hungarian Phrasebook?"
"#8 Finish the phrase: 'And now for something completely different...'"
"A man with a tape recorder up his nose"
"#9 According to Armaments, chapter two, verses nine to twenty-one, which shalt be the number thou shalt count?"
"#10 Mark all the options NOT offered by the Green Midget Cafe:"
"Spam, egg, Spam, Spam, bacon and Spam"
"Venezuelan Beaver Cheese, Spam, Spam, egg and Spam"
"Spam, Spam, Spam, Spam, Spam, Spam, wafer-thin mint, Spam, Spam, Spam and Spam"
"Lobster Thermidor au Crevettes with a mornay sauce served in a Provencale manner with shallots and aubergines garnished with truffle pate, brandy and with a fried egg on top and Spam"
"Spam, Spam, Spam, Spam, Spam, Spam, baked beans, Spam, Spam, Spam and Spam"
